item.title: Millie add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Millie add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Millie add a quote by Millie
item.description: "By chance we met, by choice we become friend" -- Millie

item.title: Millie add a quote by Millie
item.description: "Blind is not the situation when people cannot see others but when people fail to feel or sense the existence of others" -- Millie

item.title: Millie add a quote by William Arthur Ward
Millie add a quote by Leonardo da Vinci
item.description: "Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication." -- Leonardo da Vinci

item.title: Millie add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Millie add a quote by Brigham Young
item.description: "You educate a man; you educate a man. You educate a woman; you educate a generation." -- Brigham Young
